FuncDef: This command creates a newca-profileor enter the configuration context of an existingca-profile. Up to 128 ca-profiles could be created in the system. Ashutdownthe ca-profile will not affect the current up and runningipsec-tunneloripsec-gw that associated with theca-profile. But authentication afterwards will fail with ashutdown ca-profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the ca-profile, a string up to 32 characters.
This keyword creates a new ca-profile. The create keyword requirement can be enabled/disabled in the environment>create context.
